actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to assure the continuation of the present practice under which payments by States with respect to coverage of State and local employees under section 218 of that act, are made on a quarterly basis.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Assures the continuation of the present practice under which payments by States, with respect to coverage of State and local employees under the Federal Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance program of the Social Security Act, are made on a quarterly basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to assure the continuation of the present practice under which payments by States with respect to coverage of State and local employees under section 218 of that act, are made on a quarterly basis.
